text: William Henry "Harry" Arch (29 November 1894 – 1978) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back. ==References== Category:1894 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Tipton Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:West Bromwich Albion F.C. players Category:Newport County A.F.C. players Category:Willenhall F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Hartlepool United F.C. players Category:Bilston Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Harry Arch
